short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the hyperbolic, fanatic lanaguage of climate changed being snuck into the media, with comical replacements

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin replaces fear inducing language about climate, and weather with comical and clever replacements. 

Using the badges in the corner you can quickly see how much climate propaganda is embedded with in a page. You can also determine how much to censor. Low levels are for the most flagrant terms, whereas higher levels censor honorifics and add more comedy.
